amendment.description: To increase the number of detention beds and positions or FTEs in the United States consistent with the number authorized in the Intelligence Reform and Terrorism Prevention Act of 2004 (Public Law 108-458), and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 1171 proposed by Senator McCain.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1171 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 56. Record Vote Number: 182.
